sk1.name: Starstorm
sk1.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75%% of the damage.

sk2.name: Sacred Arrow
sk2.desc: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, stunning and dealing damage to the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from %arrow_min_stun% to %arrow_max_stun% seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 will be added based on the distance the arrow travelled to the target.

sk3.name: Leap
sk3.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

sk4.name: Moonlight Shadow
sk4.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired. Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.
